data.convo: I wonder if I can ask you a question . Ask me a question ? What do you want to know ? Well ... er ... it is just ... just that I ... Just what ? Stop beating around the bush . Tell me what you want to know . I ... er ... I just want to know if you could lend me a few bucks . Lend you a few bucks ? No way ! Still remember the money you borrowed me last time ? Yeah . But I ...
